This record describes some resource related to the parent record, such as the digital content.
Resource records must belong to another object.
The type of resouce is one of the following:
download: a service copy meant to be downloaded and viewed on its own.
master: a master image which can possibly produce derivatives on demand.
page: a web page on which the resource can be found.
The MIME type of the object.
Size of the object in bytes.
MD5 digest of the object.
One or more URIs where this resource can be found.
Set to true if this resouce may be accessed locally.
